video_prompt: A futuristic-suited corgi walks forward, its tail wagging, past blurry moving figures in a sleek, brightly lit corridor. Neon lines on its suit pulsate with electric blue and vibrant orange as it moves, its tongue playfully lolling. The corgi manipulates a small device with a gloved hand.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Full-body digital illustration of a futuristic corgi in a silver, form-fitting suit with glowing blue and orange neon accents, walking towards the viewer in a brightly lit modern interior. The corgi has a happy, open-mouthed grin, brown and white fur, and upright ears. The suit features padded sections, a zipper, and a belt with glowing buckle. One gloved hand holds a sci-fi device. Background shows blurry seated figures. The floor is light gray with reflections. Whimsical and action-oriented.
refined_video_prompt: A corgi strides forward, its tail wagging rhythmically. Blurry background figures shift and move past. Neon lines on its suit dynamically pulsate, alternating electric blue and vibrant orange. Its tongue playfully lolls. A gloved hand actively manipulates a device.
